channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.11
item.description:
What's New

Version 1.2.11

Changes:

  • Improve App Group: use Team ID prefix for macOS Sequoia compatibility
  • Add SparkleUpdateDelegate to backup settings before update
  • Add Macro Shortcut validation: disallow Vietnamese diacritics and spaces
  • Disable Quick Telex by default
  • Update entitlements for XKey and XKeyIM

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
